00049   
00050   void display_mutation_errors(int error, TableMutator *mutator) {
00051     std::vector<std::pair<Cell, int> > failed_mutations;
00052 
00053     mutator->get_failed(failed_mutations);
00054     if (!failed_mutations.empty()) {
00055       for (size_t i=0; i<failed_mutations.size(); i++) {
00056         cout << "Failed: (" << failed_mutations[i].first.row_key << "," 
00057              << failed_mutations[i].first.column_family;
00058         if (failed_mutations[i].first.column_qualifier)
00059           cout << ":" << failed_mutations[i].first.column_qualifier;
00060         cout << "," << failed_mutations[i].first.timestamp << ") - "
00061              << Error::get_text(failed_mutations[i].second) << endl;
00062       }
00063     }
00064     else
00065       cerr << "Error: " << Error::get_text(error) << endl;
00066   }
00067 
00068 }

00074 HqlCommandInterpreter::HqlCommandInterpreter(Client *client) : m_client(client) {
00075   return;
00076 }

00082 void HqlCommandInterpreter::execute_line(const String &line) {
00083   std::string schema_str;
00084   std::string out_str;
00085   hql_interpreter_state state;
00086   hql_interpreter interp(state);
00087   parse_info<> info;
00088   Schema *schema;
00089 
00090   info = parse(line.c_str(), interp, space_p);
00091 
00092   if (info.full) {
00093 
00094     if (state.command == COMMAND_SHOW_CREATE_TABLE) {
00095       schema_str = m_client->get_schema(state.table_name);
00096       schema = Schema::new_instance(schema_str.c_str(), strlen(schema_str.c_str()), true);
00097       if (!schema->is_valid())
00098         throw Exception(Error::BAD_SCHEMA, schema->get_error_string());
00099       schema->render_hql_create_table(state.table_name, out_str);
00100       cout << out_str << flush;
00101     }
00102     else if (state.command == COMMAND_HELP) {
00103       const char **text = HqlHelpText::Get(state.str);
00104       if (text) {
00105         for (size_t i=0; text[i]; i++)
00106           cout << text[i] << endl;
00107       }
00108       else
00109         cout << endl << "no help for '" << state.str << "'" << endl << endl;
00110     }
00111     else if (state.command == COMMAND_CREATE_TABLE) {
00112       schema = new Schema();
00113       schema->set_compressor(state.table_compressor);
00114       for (Schema::AccessGroupMapT::const_iterator ag_iter = state.ag_map.begin(); ag_iter != state.ag_map.end(); ag_iter++)
00115         schema->add_access_group((*ag_iter).second);
00116       if (state.ag_map.find("default") == state.ag_map.end()) {
00117         Schema::AccessGroup *ag = new Schema::AccessGroup();
00118         ag->name = "default";
00119         schema->add_access_group(ag);
00120       }
00121       for (Schema::ColumnFamilyMapT::const_iterator cf_iter = state.cf_map.begin(); cf_iter != state.cf_map.end(); cf_iter++) {
00122         if ((*cf_iter).second->ag == "")
00123           (*cf_iter).second->ag = "default";
00124         schema->add_column_family((*cf_iter).second);
00125       }
00126       const char *error_str = schema->get_error_string();
00127       if (error_str)
00128         throw Exception(Error::HQL_PARSE_ERROR, error_str);
00129       schema->render(schema_str);
00130 
00131       m_client->create_table(state.table_name, schema_str.c_str());
00132 
00133     }
00134     else if (state.command == COMMAND_DESCRIBE_TABLE) {
00135       schema_str = m_client->get_schema(state.table_name);
00136       cout << schema_str << endl;
00137     }
00138     else if (state.command == COMMAND_SELECT) {
00139       TablePtr table_ptr;
00140       TableScannerPtr scanner_ptr;
00141       ScanSpec scan_spec;
00142       Cell cell;
00143       uint32_t nsec;
00144       time_t unix_time;
00145       struct tm tms;
00146 
00147       scan_spec.row_limit = state.scan.limit;
00148       scan_spec.max_versions = state.scan.max_versions;
00149       for (size_t i=0; i<state.scan.columns.size(); i++)
00150         scan_spec.columns.push_back(state.scan.columns[i].c_str());
00151       if (state.scan.row != "") {
00152         scan_spec.start_row = state.scan.row.c_str();
00153         scan_spec.start_row_inclusive = true;
00154         scan_spec.end_row = state.scan.row.c_str();
00155         scan_spec.end_row_inclusive = true;
00156         scan_spec.row_limit = 1;
00157       }
00158       else {
00159         scan_spec.start_row = (state.scan.start_row == "") ? 0 : state.scan.start_row.c_str();
00160         scan_spec.start_row_inclusive = state.scan.start_row_inclusive;
00161         scan_spec.end_row = (state.scan.end_row == "") ? Key::END_ROW_MARKER : state.scan.end_row.c_str();
00162         scan_spec.end_row_inclusive = state.scan.end_row_inclusive;
00163       }
00164       scan_spec.interval.first  = state.scan.start_time;
00165       scan_spec.interval.second = state.scan.end_time;
00166       scan_spec.return_deletes = state.scan.return_deletes;
00167 
00168       table_ptr = m_client->open_table(state.table_name);
00169 
00170       scanner_ptr = table_ptr->create_scanner(scan_spec);
00171 
00172       while (scanner_ptr->next(cell)) {
00173         if (state.scan.display_timestamps) {
00174           if (m_timestamp_output_format == TIMESTAMP_FORMAT_USECS) {
00175             printf("%llu\t", (long long unsigned int)cell.timestamp);
00176           }
00177           else {
00178             nsec = cell.timestamp % 1000000000LL;
00179             unix_time = cell.timestamp / 1000000000LL;
00180             gmtime_r(&unix_time, &tms);
00181             printf("%d-%02d-%02d %02d:%02d:%02d.%09d\t", tms.tm_year+1900, tms.tm_mon+1, tms.tm_mday, tms.tm_hour, tms.tm_min, tms.tm_sec, nsec);
00182           }
00183         }
00184         if (!state.scan.keys_only) {
00185           if (cell.column_family) {
00186             printf("%s\t%s", cell.row_key, cell.column_family);
00187             if (*cell.column_qualifier)
00188               printf(":%s", cell.column_qualifier);
00189           }
00190           else
00191             printf("%s", cell.row_key);
00192           if (cell.flag != FLAG_INSERT)
00193             printf("\t%s\tDELETE\n", std::string((const char *)cell.value, cell.value_len).c_str());
00194           else
00195             printf("\t%s\n", std::string((const char *)cell.value, cell.value_len).c_str());
00196         }
00197         else
00198           printf("%s\n", cell.row_key);
00199       }
00200     }
00201     else if (state.command == COMMAND_LOAD_DATA) {
00202       TablePtr table_ptr;
00203       TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00204       LoadDataSource *lds;
00205       uint64_t timestamp;
00206       KeySpec key;
00207       uint8_t *value;
00208       uint32_t value_len;
00209       uint32_t consumed;
00210       uint64_t file_size;
00211       uint64_t total_values_size = 0;
00212       uint64_t total_rowkey_size = 0;
00213       string start_msg;
00214       uint64_t insert_count = 0;
00215       Stopwatch stopwatch;
00216       bool into_table = true;
00217       bool display_timestamps = false;
00218       FILE *outfp = 0;
00219 
00220       if (state.table_name == "") {
00221         if (state.output_file == "")
00222           throw Exception(Error::HQL_PARSE_ERROR, "LOAD DATA INFILE ... INTO FILE - bad filename");
00223         outfp = fopen(state.output_file.c_str(), "w");
00224         into_table = false;
00225       }
00226       else {
00227         table_ptr = m_client->open_table(state.table_name);
00228         mutator_ptr = table_ptr->create_mutator();
00229       }
00230 
00231       if (!FileUtils::exists(state.input_file.c_str()))
00232         throw Exception(Error::FILE_NOT_FOUND, state.input_file);
00233 
00234       file_size = FileUtils::size(state.input_file.c_str());
00235 
00236       printf("\nLoading ");
00237       if (file_size > 1000000000000LL)
00238         printf("%3lld,", file_size/1000000000000LL);
00239       if (file_size > 1000000000LL)
00240         printf("%3lld,", (file_size%1000000000000LL) / 1000000000LL);
00241       if (file_size > 1000000LL)
00242         printf("%3lld,", (file_size%1000000000LL) / 1000000LL);
00243       if (file_size > 1000LL)
00244         printf("%3lld,", (file_size%1000000LL) / 1000LL);
00245       printf("%3lld", file_size % 1000LL);
00246       printf(" bytes of input data...\n");
00247       fflush(stdout);
00248 
00249       boost::progress_display show_progress( file_size );
00250 
00251       lds = new LoadDataSource(state.input_file, state.header_file, state.key_columns, state.timestamp_column);
00252 
00253       if (!into_table) {
00254         display_timestamps = lds->has_timestamps();
00255         if (display_timestamps)
00256           fprintf(outfp, "timestamp\trowkey\tcolumnkey\tvalue\n");
00257         else
00258           fprintf(outfp, "rowkey\tcolumnkey\tvalue\n");
00259       }
00260 
00261       while (lds->next(0, &timestamp, &key, &value, &value_len, &consumed)) {
00262         if (value_len > 0) {
00263           insert_count++;
00264           total_values_size += value_len;
00265           total_rowkey_size += key.row_len;
00266           if (into_table) {
00267             try {
00268               mutator_ptr->set(timestamp, key, value, value_len);
00269             }
00270             catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00271               display_mutation_errors(e.code(), mutator_ptr.get());
00272             }
00273           }
00274           else {
00275             if (display_timestamps)
00276               fprintf(outfp, "%llu\t%s\t%s\t%s\n", (long long unsigned int)timestamp, (const char *)key.row, key.column_family, (const char *)value);
00277             else
00278               fprintf(outfp, "%s\t%s\t%s\n", (const char *)key.row, key.column_family, (const char *)value);
00279           }
00280         }
00281         show_progress += consumed;
00282       }
00283       
00284       delete lds;
00285 
00286       if (into_table) {
00287         try {
00288           mutator_ptr->flush();
00289         }
00290         catch (Exception &e) {
00291           display_mutation_errors(e.code(), mutator_ptr.get());
00292         }
00293       }
00294       else
00295         fclose(outfp);
00296 
00297       if (show_progress.count() < file_size)
00298         show_progress += file_size - show_progress.count();
00299 
00300       stopwatch.stop();
00301 
00302       printf("Load complete.\n");
00303       printf("\n");
00304       printf("  Elapsed time:  %.2f s\n", stopwatch.elapsed());
00305       printf("Avg value size:  %.2f bytes\n", (double)total_values_size / insert_count);
00306       printf("  Avg key size:  %.2f bytes\n", (double)total_rowkey_size / insert_count);
00307       printf("    Throughput:  %.2f bytes/s\n", (double)file_size / stopwatch.elapsed());
00308       printf(" Total inserts:  %llu\n", (long long unsigned int)insert_count);
00309       printf("    Throughput:  %.2f inserts/s\n", (double)insert_count / stopwatch.elapsed());
00310       if (mutator_ptr)
00311         printf("       Resends:  %llu\n", (long long unsigned int)mutator_ptr->get_resend_count());
00312       printf("\n");
00313 
00314       /*
00315       printf("Load complete (%.2fs elapsed_time, %.2f bytes/s, %.2f inserts/s)\n",
00316              elapsed_time, (double)file_size / elapsed_time, (double)insert_count / elapsed_time);
00317       */
00318 
00319     }
00320     else if (state.command == COMMAND_INSERT) {
00321       TablePtr table_ptr;
00322       TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00323       KeySpec key;
00324       char *column_qualifier;
00325       std::string tmp_str;
00326 
00327       table_ptr = m_client->open_table(state.table_name);
00328 
00329       mutator_ptr = table_ptr->create_mutator();
00330 
00331       for (size_t i=0; i<state.inserts.size(); i++) {
00332         key.row = state.inserts[i].row_key.c_str();
00333         key.row_len = state.inserts[i].row_key.length();
00334         key.column_family = state.inserts[i].column_key.c_str();
00335         if ((column_qualifier = strchr(state.inserts[i].column_key.c_str(), ':')) != 0) {
00336           *column_qualifier++ = 0;
00337           key.column_qualifier = column_qualifier;
00338           key.column_qualifier_len = strlen(column_qualifier);
00339         }
00340         else {
00341           key.column_qualifier = 0;
00342           key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00343         }
00344         try {
00345           mutator_ptr->set(state.inserts[i].timestamp, key, (uint8_t *)state.inserts[i].value.c_str(), (uint32_t)state.inserts[i].value.length());
00346         }
00347         catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00348           display_mutation_errors(e.code(), mutator_ptr.get());
00349         }
00350       }
00351 
00352       try {
00353         mutator_ptr->flush();
00354       }
00355       catch (Exception &e) {
00356         display_mutation_errors(e.code(), mutator_ptr.get());
00357       }
00358     }
00359     else if (state.command == COMMAND_DELETE) {
00360       TablePtr table_ptr;
00361       TableMutatorPtr mutator_ptr;
00362       KeySpec key;
00363       char *column_qualifier;
00364       std::string tmp_str;
00365 
00366       table_ptr = m_client->open_table(state.table_name);
00367 
00368       mutator_ptr = table_ptr->create_mutator();
00369 
00370       memset(&key, 0, sizeof(key));
00371       key.row = state.delete_row.c_str();
00372       key.row_len = state.delete_row.length();
00373 
00374       if (state.delete_time != 0)
00375         state.delete_time++;
00376 
00377       if (state.delete_all_columns) {
00378         try {
00379           mutator_ptr->set_delete(state.delete_time, key);
00380         }
00381         catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00382           display_mutation_errors(e.code(), mutator_ptr.get());
00383           return;
00384         }
00385       }
00386       else {
00387         for (size_t i=0; i<state.delete_columns.size(); i++) {
00388           key.column_family = state.delete_columns[i].c_str();
00389           if ((column_qualifier = strchr(state.delete_columns[i].c_str(), ':')) != 0) {
00390             *column_qualifier++ = 0;
00391             key.column_qualifier = column_qualifier;
00392             key.column_qualifier_len = strlen(column_qualifier);
00393           }
00394           else {
00395             key.column_qualifier = 0;
00396             key.column_qualifier_len = 0;
00397           }
00398           try {
00399             mutator_ptr->set_delete(state.delete_time, key);
00400           }
00401           catch (Hypertable::Exception &e) {
00402             display_mutation_errors(e.code(), mutator_ptr.get());
00403           }
00404         }
00405       }
00406       try {
00407         mutator_ptr->flush();
00408       }
00409       catch (Exception &e) {
00410         display_mutation_errors(e.code(), mutator_ptr.get());
00411       }
00412     }
00413     else if (state.command == COMMAND_SHOW_TABLES) {
00414       std::vector<std::string> tables;
00415       m_client->get_tables(tables);
00416       if (tables.empty())
00417         cout << "Empty set" << endl;
00418       else {
00419         for (size_t i=0; i<tables.size(); i++)
00420           cout << tables[i] << endl;
00421       }
00422     }
00423     else if (state.command == COMMAND_DROP_TABLE) {
00424       m_client->drop_table(state.table_name, state.if_exists);
00425     }
00426     else
00427       throw Exception(Error::HQL_PARSE_ERROR, std::string("unsupported command: ") + line);
00428   }
00429   else
00430     throw Exception(Error::HQL_PARSE_ERROR, std::string("parse error at: ") + info.stop);
00431 
00432 }
